mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(pNum, pCateNum, pName, pPrice, pDiscountRate, pContent, delivType, pDate) VALUES(#{pNum}, #{pCateNum}, #{pName}, #{pPrice}, #{pDiscountRate}, #{pContent}, #{delivType}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM product p JOIN storeDetailOpt d ON p.pNum = d.pNum

SELECT p.pNum, pCateNum, pName, pDetailPrice, pImgName,pDate FROM product p JOIN storeDetailOpt d ON p.pNum = d.pNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT pImgNum, pImgName, pNum FROM( SELECT pImgNum, pImgName, pNum, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY pNum ORDER BY pImgNum ASC)rank FROM productImage ) WHERE rank = 1 ) i ON p.pNum = i.pNum
